findings.title: Accommodation of Non-ERC20-Compliant Tokens
findings.description: The transfer function does not follow ERC-20 standard specifications, causing issues if not handled properly.

findings.title: Revisited Logic In StakingRewards::notifyRewardAmount()
findings.description: The `StakingRewards` contract provides an external `notifyRewardAmount()` function for the privileged `rewardsDistribution` account to update the values of user reward calculation related state variables. However, the current design needs to be revisited regarding the range check logic for the state variable `rewardRate`.

findings.title: Incompatibility with Deflationary/Rebasing Tokens
findings.description: The StakingRewards contract may not work correctly with deflationary/rebasing tokens due to inconsistent internal asset balances and actual token balances.

findings.title: Trust Issue of Admin Keys
findings.description: Privileged account 'owner' has critical role in governing and regulating system-wide operations, posing a counter-party risk to protocol users.
